import React,{useState,useEffect}from'react';import{jsxs as _jsxs,jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Profile=()=>{const[peeps,setPeeps]=useState([]);const username=localStorage.getItem('username');// Get the logged-in username
useEffect(()=>{fetchUserPeeps();},[]);const fetchUserPeeps=async()=>{try{const response=await fetch("http://localhost:8080/posts/author/".concat(username));const data=await response.json();setPeeps(data);}catch(error){console.error('Error fetching user peeps:',error);}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("main",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("h1",{children:[username,"'s Peeps"]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("ul",{className:"list-group",children:peeps.map(peep=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("li",{className:"list-group-item",children:peep.content},peep.postId))})]})});};export default Profile;
